original_text: To Seth also a son was born, and he called his name Enosh. At that time people began to call upon the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 셋도 아들을 낳고 그의 이름을 에노스라 하였으며 그 때에 사람들이 비로소 여호와의 이름을 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: To Seth also a son was born,
and he called his name Enosh.
people began to call upon the name of the Lord.
